casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Followell, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellants.

[Cite as State ex rel. Followell v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 176.]

(No. 95-2252 Submitted May 12, 1998 Decided June 17, 1998.) William D. Snyder & Associates and John Lesko, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William D. Haders, Assistant Attorney General, for appellants.

*177The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
